section.name: CVS Repository with command line client

body.section:
From the command line checkout the colt module via ssh2:
export CVS_RSH=ssh cvs -d:ext:`whoami`@portnoy.lbl.gov:/home/portnoy/u3/src checkout colt

section.name: CVS Repository with GUI client
section.p: With a GUI client, use cvs with ssh2 to login into
For eclipse users: The eclipse connection type is "extssh2". You will probably need the eclipse extssh2 plugin.
section.fixme: Should describe CVS access options in a more concise manner and possibly refer to CVS tutorials.
